ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.user

Class UserProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.user.UserProfile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable

    public class UserProfile
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable
    Model that represents a given User's profile information. Contains various information, including contact information. Can be modified by the Application User at any time.

    Will notify the parent user of an changes made

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserProfile

        public UserProfile()
        Creates a new profile for a user and should be observed by a User. Called by User when getting an instance of a UserProfile. Should not be called independently as it wont be able to sync with any backend data service.

    • Method Detail

      • getCity

        public java.lang.String getCity()
        Get the profile's city. This should only be called by the view!
        Returns:
        profile's city

      • setCity

        public void setCity(java.lang.String city)
        Set the profile's city. This should only be called by the controller! ex. UserProfile profile = PrimaryUser.getInstance().getProfile(); //In the controller code profile.setCity("Portland");
        Parameters:
        city - new value for city

        public void setEmail(java.lang.String email)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • setPhone

        public void setPhone(java.lang.String phone)
        Set the profile's phone number. This should only be called by the controller! ex. UserProfile profile = PrimaryUser.getInstance().getProfile(); //In the controller code profile.setPhone("780 123 1234");
        Parameters:
        phone - the new value for phone number

      • commitChanges

        public void commitChanges()
        Alias for notifyObservers to be called after any edits have been made to the object. This should only be called by the controller! WARNING: This call may hit the network, and should never be called from the UI thread!

      • notifyObservers

        public void notifyObservers()
        Called when state of the Observable should be noticed by the Observers.

      • removeObserver

        public void removeObserver(Observer observer)
        Remove an Observer from maintained collection of Observers. This Observer should no longer be notified of changes.
        Specified by:
        removeObserver in interface Observable
        Parameters:
        observer - the Observer to remove

      • clearObservers

        public void clearObservers()
        Description copied from interface: Observable
        Remove all Observers from maintained collection of Observers. These Observers should no longer be notified of changes.
        Specified by:
        clearObservers in interface Observable
